column1: The Purple Pig////I've waited a along time to come here
column2: it's never seemed to work out with my schedule when i have been in chicago.  I was definitely not disappointed.  the staff was attentive but not overbearing.  I ordered several of the recommendations of the waiter.  the squid ink pasta was very good
column4: and i'd absolutely recommend the beets.  Can't wait to return here.
